Basi ajile sayi wanganyao tachigamba kuona ali pachanya petaka
Ana jinyyiche abali ja Musa
Pandema jawam'bilaasile Ambujegwe (Allah) pachiwata chakutakata (chakuwilanjikwa) Tuwaa
(Nikuntenda kuti): Jaawulani kwa Firiauna, chisimu jwalakwejo jusumbile mpika
Ni nkajile: “Ana nkusaka kuti n'diiswejesye?”
“Ni nan'jongolele kwa Ambuje wenu kuti mwaajogopeje?”
Basi niwannosisye chisimosimo chekulungwa
Nambo jwaakaaniile nikunyosya
Kaneka jwachitundumalile (chikulupi) aku junankulimbichila (kwasiwilila wandu kwa Allah)
Basi jwaasonganganyisye (asawi) nikwawilanga (wandu)
Ni jwatite: “Une ni nam'mbuje gwenu jwapenani kusyene!”
Basi Allah ni wankwembekenye ni ipotesi ligongo lya malowe gakwe gambesi ni gandanda
Chisimu mu yalakweyi mwana chaamuko kwa mundu jwaakun'jogopa (Allah)
Ana wanganyammwe niwakusausya nnope kagumbidwe (kenu) kapena liwunde lyawalitawile
Walinyakwile nsingu wakwe nikulikolosya
Ni wachiunichile chilo chakwe (nichipi) nikulikoposya lilanguka lyakwe (muusi)
Nombe litaka panyuma payalakweyo walitandiche
Wakopwesye mwalakwemo mesi gakwe ni mopo wakwe
Nombe matumbi wagasimiiche
(Kuwa) yakunsengwasya wanganyammwe ni ilango yenu
Basi ndema jaliichiika likungu lyekulungwa nnope (Kiyama)
Lyele lisikulyo mundu tachikumbuchila yawapanganyisye
Nombe Moto Waukali wuchiwichidwa palangulangu kwa nkulola (jwalijose)
Sano mundu jwawasumbile mpika
Ni kulongosya umi wa duniya
Chisimu Moto Waukali basi ni liuto lyakwe
Sano jwaakogopa kuti tachija kwima pameso pa Ambujegwe (Allah), nikuwukanyaga ntima ku isako yakusakala
Chisimu Litimbe lya ku Mbepo basi ni liuto lyakwe
Akum'buusya (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ya ndema (jakwichila Kiyama kuti): “Jichiwa chakachi?”
Mmwe nganinkola umanyilisi wanti nikujitomeka
Kwa Ambuje wenupe (Allah) ni kuchipelela kwakwe (kwa umanyilisi wa Kiyama)
Mmwe masengo genu ni kwaatetela waakujijogopa (Kiyamajo)
Chisimu wanganyao lisiku lyatachijiona (Kiyamajo) tachiwa nti chisawu nganatama (pa duniya) ikaweje ligulo limo kapena kundawi kwakwe
Jwautile sinya (Muhammadi ﷺ) ni kulola kumbali
Ligongo lyakum’bichiilila jwangalola
Ana chichi chachimmanyisye kuti mwine jwalakwejo kuwa nkuliswejesya (ku ilemwa)
Mwine chakumbuchile, basi nikunkamuchisya kumbuchilako
Nambo mundu jwaliweni kusichila
Basi jwalakwejo mmwe ni nkunkosowalila
Pangalitu ulemwa kukwenu naga ngaakuliswejesya (ku ukafili)
Nambo mundu jwam’bichilile aku juchikangamalaga
Soni jwalakwejo ali nkun'jogopa (Allah)
Basi ya jwalakwejo mmwe ni nkuikwanjila
Ngwamba (ngasintenda iyyo)! Chisimu galakwe (ma Ayaga) gawele chikumbusyo
Basi jwaakusaka talikumbusye najo (Qur’anijo)
(Jili) mu ikalakala yakuchimbichikwa
Yapenani, yakuswejesyedwa
Ili m’makono mwa akulemba (Achimalaika)
Wakuchimbichika, waakunda (malamusi)
Pamasile palaniwe mundu (kafili), kanila kwakwe kwalakweku ni kwantiuli
Ana an'gumbile kuumila mu chinduchi
Kuumila m’mesi (gawalume ni wakongwe) an'gumbile, ni kumpanjila mpango (wakagumbidwe kakwe)
Kaneka naakun'jepepachisyaga litala (lyakopochela ku duniya)
Kaneko nakasampaga chiwa ni kunsiika m’malembe
Soni patachisakapo tachinsyusya
Ngwamba! Chisimu (kafili) nganakwanilisyepe yannamwile (Allah)
Basi achetelele mundu ya yakulya yakwe
Chisimu Uwwe tukasakusula mesi (gawula) mwamachili
Kaneka ni tukasaligangaga litaka kuliganga kusyene
Ni tukasakoposya mwalakwemo songolo
Kwisa soni isogosi ya zabibu ni maupulu (gakulya ilango)
Ni kwisa soni isogosi ya zaituni (yakwenga mauta) ni itela yatende
Ni migunda jaitela yejinji
Kwisa soni isogosi (yamitundu mitundu) ni mopo
(Kuwa) yakunsengwasya wanganyammwe ni ilango yenu
Basi ndema jaliichiika lipenga lyakusiwa m’mawiwi (ligongo lya machili gakwe)
Lyele lisikulyo mundu tachatila achimwenegwe
Kwisa soni mamagwe ni babagwe
Ni kwisa soni wankwakwe ni wanache wakwe
Mundu jwalijose mwa wanganyao lyele lisikulyo tachikola yakunkwanila (kuntendekasya kuti akakosowalila ya jwine)
Ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichiwa syakumelemenda
Syakusechelela ni kusengwa (pakupikana yakuja ku Mbepo)
Sano ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichipakala luwundu
Sichiwa siunichilidwe ni chipi
Wanganyao ni wali achimakafili wakusakasya nnope
Pandema jalichikulunjidwa lyuwa (nikutyoka lilanguka lyakwe)
Ni ndema jasichipatuka ndondwa
Ni ndema jagachijendesyedwa matumbi (paagachuwa m’mangwakwe)
Ni ndema jasichilechedwa ngamiya syana mawele gepele
Ni ndema jaichisonganganyisyidwa inyama yamwitinji
Ni ndema jasichikolesyedwa mbwani moto
Ni ndema jajichilumbikanyisyidwa mitima (ku ilu yakwe)
Ni ndema jachachiwusyidwa mwanache jwankwongwe jwawasichidwe ali jwaumi
Kuti wawulajidwe ni ulemwachi
Ni ndema jaichipindikulidwa ikalakala (mugalembedwe masengo gamundu)
Ni ndema jalichitandukulidwa liwunde
Ni ndema jauchikwisilidwa Moto Waukali
Ni ndema jajichiwandichisyidwa Mbepo
Mundu jwalijose tachimanyilila yayiche nayo
Basi ngusilumbila ndondwa syasikusisika muusi
(Ni) syasikwendaga (chilo kaneka) ni kusisika pakutiwila
Ni nguchilumbila soni chilo ndema jachikwika ni kutyoka
Ni ngukulumbila soni kumasikusiku ndema jakukulanguka
Chisimu aji (Qur’aniji) gawele malowe ga (kulungusyidwa ni) Ntenga Jwakuchimbichika (Jibulilu)
Nsyene machili, soni jwana uchimbichimbi wapenani kwa (Allah) Nsyene Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu)
Jwakundidwa malamusi kwinaniko (ni Achimalaika) soni jwakulupichika
Soni Nnongo n'jenuju (Muhammadi ﷺ) nganawa jwamasoka
Soni chisimu chene (Muhammadi ﷺ) wam'bweni jwalakwe (Jibulilu mu kagumbidwe kakwe kasyesyene) kuchipelela chameso chakuonechela (cha ku ngopoko lyuwa)
Soni jwalakwe nganijuwa jwausuchi pa (umanyilisi wa) yakusisika
Soni aji (Qur’an) nganigawa malowe ga shetani jwakuwinjidwa
Nambi kwapi nkuja
Nganijiwa aji (Qur’an) ikaweje chikumbusyo cha iwumbe yosope
Kwa mundu jwaakusaka mwa jenumanja kuti ajongoche
Ni nganim'ba nsachile, ikaweje akasache kaje Allah M’mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope
Pandema jalichipasuka liwunde
Ni ndema jasichilakatika ndondwa
Ni ndema jasichigumuchila mbwani
Ni ndema jagachiukulidwa malembe
Mundu jwalijose juchimanyilila yajwalongwesye (kupanganya) ni yajwalesile munyuma
E mmwe amundu! Ana ni chichi chinnyenjile kwa (kwikanila kunnyosya) M’mbuje gwenu (Allah) Jwantuka wejinji
Ajula jwawan'gumbile, ni kunkolosya pa kunnandanya (iwalo yenu) soni ni kun'golosya (nsingu wenu)
Mukawoneche kalikose kawasachile (kuti m'bonecheje) wampanganyisye
Ngwamba! Nambo kuti wanganyammwe nkukanila ya malipilo
Soni chisimu kwa jenumanja kwana (Achimalaika) wakunnolela (ni kusunga itendo yenu)
Wakuchimbichika, wakulemba
Akumanyilila yankuntenda
Chisimu atenda ngoto chachiwa nchindimba (mu Mbepo Jakusengwasya)
Sano wandu wakusakasya nnope, chisimu chene tachiwa m’Moto Waukali
Chachiujinjila Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Soni wanganyao ngasawa asowile mwalakwemo (pakopoka ata panandi)
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Soni ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Lyele ni lisiku lyangakola mundu chilichose chanti ni kunkamuchisya mundu jwine. Nombe ulamusi (wosope) lyele lisikulyo uchiwa wa Allah pe
Ipotesi ni yao wakupuungusya (miliingo)
Awala waakutiji naga ndema jaakulilinjila ku wandu (pakwasuma indu yao) akasaligumbachisyaga
Nambo pa ndema jaakwaaliinjila (wanduo) kapena kwapimila (pakwasumisya indu) akupungusyaga
Ana ngakuganisya wanganyao yanti chachiukulidwa (m’malembe)
Pa Lisiku Lyekulungwa nnope
Lisiku lyatachijima wandu pameso pa M’mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope
Yakuona! Chisimu yakulembedwa ya (masengo ga) wandu wakusakasya nnope ili mu Sijjin
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Sijjin
Chele ni chitabu (chekulungwa) chachilembedwe (nkati mwakwe yakusakalape)
Ipotesi lyele lisikulyo taachiipata wakanila
Awala wakukanila ya Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Ni pangali jwampaka alikanile lyalakwelyo ikaweje jwalijose jwakusumba mpika jwasambi syejinji
Pandema jakusoomedwa kukwakwe ma Aya Getu akasatiji: “Asi ni adisiadisi sya wandu wandanda.”
Ngwamba! Nambo kuti m’mitima mwao mwana nkuwo wa (ilemwa) yaawele ali nkupanganya
Yakuona! Chisimu wanganyao lyele lisikulyo kwa M’mbuje gwao (Allah) tachisiwilidwa (mwanti ngaaja kum’bona)
Kaneka chisimu wanganyao tachiujinjila Moto Waukali
Kaneko ni kuchiwechetedwa kuti: “Ayi ni ayilayila yamwaliji nkuikanila.”
Yakuona! Chisimu yakulembedwa ya (masengo ga) atenda ngoto ili mu Illiyyun
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Illiyyun
Chalakwecho ni chitabu (chekulungwa) chachilembedwe (nkati mwakwe yambonepe)
Akuchiwichilaga umboni (Achimalaika) wawandichisyidwe (kwa Allah)
Chisimu atenda ngoto tachiwa m’chindimba (mu Mbepo Jakusengwasya)
Ali pachanya pa indanda yetandiche chenene aku achilolaga (ku chindimba chawapele ni kum'bona soni Allah)
Tinchikumanyilila pangope syao kumelemenda kwa chindimba
Takamwesyedweje nkologo wambone nnope wesiwe (ni isiwilo yakulimbangana)
Kumbesi kwa kumwako (chikukanunjileje luwumba lwa) miski. Sano kuti akaipate yele basi apikisane akupikisana (pakutenda yambone)
Soni chakuwanganyichisya chakwe (nkologowo chigakawe) mesi gakuumila mu Tasnim
Jwalakwejo ni tutumule jwachakamweje (wandu) wakuwandichisyidwa (kwa Allah)
Chisimu (ku duniya) wandu wawannewele (Allah) waliji nkwaseka wandu wakulupilila
Mwanti ndema jawaliji nkupita (wakulupililao) paali wanganyao waliji nkukupililana meso (mwakuchembulusya)
Sano naga atite agalauche kuja kwaachin'jao wagalaukaga ali nkusengwa (ligongo lya kuchembulusya kwao)
Soni naga ali wawenimo watiji: “Chisimu wanganyawa ni wali wakupotela nnope.”
Nambotu (achimakafilio) nganatumisyidwa kuwa wakwalolela (Asilamu nikusunga itendo yao)
Nambo lelojino (lisiku lya Kiyama) wandu wawakulupilile chawe ali nkugaseka makafili
Ali pachanya pa indanda yetandiche chenene aku achigalolaga (makafiligo galinkulagasika)
Ana alipiidwe achimakafili pa yawaliji nkutenda
Pandema jalichipapuka liwunde
Ni kwisa kunda lilamusi lya M’mbujeegwe, soni liichiwajilwa (kuti likunde)
Ni ndema jalichijasyisyidwa litaka (pakusyaga matumbi ni ikwesya)
Ni kwisa kuponya kusa (litakalyo) yayaliji nkati mwakwe nikuwa mwangali chachipali
Ni kwisa kunda lilamusi lya M’mbujeegwe, soni liichiwajilwa (kuti likunde)
E mmwe amundu! Chisimutu mmwe nkukangamala wa kwa Ambuje wenu (Allah) nchilimbichilaga (kutenda itendo yambone kapena yakusakala), basi ni tinchisimangana nayo (pa lisiku lya Kiyamalyo)
Sano mundu jwatachipedwa chitabu chakwe ku nkono wakwe wan'dyo
Basi jwalakwe tachiwalanjidwa kuwalanjidwa kwakwepepala
Soni ni tachiujila kwa achalongo achin'jakwe ali jwakusengwa
Nambo mundu jwatachipedwa chitabu chakwe cha kunyuma kwa n'gongo wakwe
Basi jwalakwe, tachichiwilanga chonasiko (kuti bola agambe kuwa, nambo ngasiyikomboleka)
Ni tachijinjila ku Moto Wakulapuka
Chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji jwakusengwa (pajwaliji) ni achalongo achin'jakwe (ku duniya)
Chisimu jwalakwe jwasimichisyaga kuti ngasaujila (kwa Allah)
Elo! Chisimu Ambujegwe waliji ali nkunnolechesya
Basi ngukulumbila kuchejela kwegulo
Kwisa soni chilo ni yachikusonganganyaga
Ni mwesi ndema jaukwanila lilanguka (lyakwe)
Chisimu wanganyammwe chinsimanganeje nako kawe kane kutyochela pa kawe kane (paumi wa duniya uno mpaka kwa Akhera)
Ana akwete chichi wanganyao chikwatendekasya kuti akakulupilila
Soni pati jichisoomedwaga kukwao Qur’an wangasujudu
Nambo kuti achimakafili agamba kanila basi
Sano Allah ni jwaakuyimanya chenene yaakusonganganya wanganyao
Basi mwatagulilani ya ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
Ikaweje awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, akwete kupata wanganyao malipilo gangamala
Ngulilumbila liwunde lyalikwete ndondwa syekulungwa-kulungwa ni mwakwenda mwakwe
Ni Lisiku Lyewichidwe chilanga
Kwisa soni nkuwichila ni nkuwichilidwa umboni
Pamasile pawalaniwe achinsyene masimbo
(Ga) moto wawakwete sasu (syejinji syakuukolechesya ni kwachomela wandu wakulupilila)
Pandema janti wanganyao waliji ali chitamile mungulugulu mwakwe
Soni wanganyao waliji aku ali nkulolela yawaliji nkwatenda wakulupilila (yakwachoma motoyo)
Ni nganauwona ulemwa uliose kwa jamanjao ikaweje ligongo lyanti waliji nkunkulupilila Allah Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwakulapilildwa kusyesyene
Ajula Jwauli wakwe uchimwene wa kumawunde ni petaka, sanotu Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Mboni
Chisimu awala wawalagasisye wakulupilila wachilume ni wakulupilila wachikongwe (pakwachoma moto) kaneka ni ngatenda toba, basi akwete kupata ilagasyo ya Jahannama, soni akwete kupata ilagasyo yakutinisya
Chisimu awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, akwete kupata Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Kwalakweko nikupunda kwekulungwa
Chisimu kapeleche ka ilagasyo ka Ambuje wenu (Allah) kawele kaukali nnope
Chisimu Jwelepejo ni juwatandisye (gumba iwumbe) soni ni jutachiyiusya-usya (kuigumba panyuma pakonasika)
Soni Jwalakwe ni Jwakululuka kusyene Jwachinonyelo chejinji
Nsyene Arish (Chindanda Chaulungu), Jwakuchimbichika kusyene
Jwakutenda yajukusaka mwangalepeleka
Ana jinyyiche abali ja mikutula ja asilikali
Achina Firiauna ni achina Samuda
Nambo kuti achimakafili ali mu kukanila basi
Sano Allah ni wasyungulile chakunyuma kwao
Nambo jalakweji ni Qur’an Jakuchimbichika
(Jilembedwe) mu Ubawo Wagosedwa
Ngulilumbila liwunde ni chakwisa chilo
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya chakwisa chilo
(Jalakwejo ni) ndondwa jakupowola (chipi ligongo lya kuwala nnope)
Pangali mundu jwalijose ikaweje kwa jwalakwejo kwana nkunnolela (jwaakusunga itendo yakwe)
Basi achetelele mundu, ana agumbidwe kuumila ku chichi
Agumbidwe kuumila ku mesi gakusumbika
Gakopokaga kutyochela chilikati cha maupa ga n'gongo (wa walume) ni maupa ga chidali (cha wakongwe)
Chisimu Jwalakwe (Allah) pakum'buchisya (kuwumi mundujo) awele Jwakombola kusyene
Lisiku lyasichionechela papaswela asili (syosope)
Ni ngasakola (mundujo) machili galigose namuno nkulupusyo
Ngukulumbila kwinani kwagwisyagwisya wula
Ni ngulilumbila soni litaka lyaliganjikaga (pakoposya mmela)
Chisimu jalakwe (Qur’aniji) gawele malowe gakulekanganya (chilikati cha yakuona ni yaunami)
Soni jalakweji nganijiwa chindu chambenje
Chisimu wanganyao akuwa ali nkutenda malindi (kwa Asilamu)
None ni ngwauchisya malindi (gaogo pangaapa ilagasyo chitema kuti alilechelele)
Basi, mwalechelesyani achimakafili, mwalechelelani panandipe (chaiwone)
Liswejesyani lina lya Ambuje wenu (Allah) Wapenani kusyene
Awala wawagumbile (chilichose) ni kuchikolosya
Soni Awala wawapimiile (chilichose mwachiichiweela) ni kuchijongolela (ku yawachipimileyo)
Soni Awala waakumesya mopo
Ni kuwusyusya kuwa wejumu wakupiililila
Chitunsoomesye ni ngan'diwalila
Ikaweje yasachile Allah, chisimu Jwalakwe jukumanyililaga yakuonechela ni yayikasasisika
Ni chitun'jepepachisye litala lyakwalukangana (lyakutendela yambone)
Basi kumbusyani naga kumbusyako tikuwe kwakamuchisya
Talikumbusye mundu jwaakun'jogopa (Allah)
Ni takuwambale (mundu) jwakusakala nnope
Ajula jwatakajinjile ku Moto Wekulungwa
Soni ngachija kumpata chiwa mwalakwemo, nambo soni ngaaja kuwa ni umi (wambone)
Pamasile paapundile mundu jwaliswejesye (ntima wakwe)
Ni akuwa ali nkulikumbuchila Lina lya Ambujegwe (pakulikolanga) aku achiswaliji
Nambo wanganyammwe nkulongosya umi wa duniya
Kutendaga Akhera ni jambone nnope soni jandamo
Chisimu yalakweyi yili mu ikalakala yandanda
Ikalakala ya Ibrahima ni Musa
Ana jinyyiche abali ja chakuunichila (wandu ni yogoyo yakwe, jajili Kiyama)
Ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichiwa syakunyosyeka
Syasyapanganyisye masengo (gasambi ku duniya), syakupela (nikwaluka ku Akhera)
Sichijinjila ku Moto Wakupoteka nnope
Sichimwesyedwa mu tutumule jwansemule kusyene
Ngasakola wanganyao yakulya ikaweje miwa janchongwe
Jangajimbasya soni jangakamuchisya ku sala
Ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichiwa m’chindimba
Ligongo lya masengo gakwe (gambone) sichiwa syakusengwa
Ku Mbepo Japenani
Ngasisija kupikana kwalakweko yangali mate
Kweleko kwana tutumule jwakujilimaga
Kweleko kwana itengu yauchimbichimbi yenyakulidwe
Ni migawo jewichidwe (chilepe)
Ni misago jejalidwe mu ntungo wambone
Ni yakutandika yaofuofu yetandichidwe posepose
Ana ngakujiona ngamiya yajatite kagumbidwe
Ni liwunde yalyatite kanyakulidwe
Ni matumbi yagatite kasimichidwe
Ni litaka yalyatite katandichidwe
Basi kumbusyani, chisimu mmwejo ni nkukumbusya
Nganim'batu mmwe wakwakanganichisya wanganyao (chikulupi)
Ikaweje jwatagalauche (kuleka masengo gambone) ni kufulu (kuleka Usilamu)
Basi Allah tachinnagasya ni ilagasyo yekulungwa nnope
Chisimu Kukwetu pe ni kwakuujila kwao
Soni chisimu kuwalanjidwa kwao kuli Nowe
Ngukulumbila kumasikusiku
Ni ilo likumi (yandanda yamwesi wa Mfungotatu)
Ni (indu yayili) yiwiliyiwili kwisa soni (yayili) chimochimo
Ni chilo ndema jachikuwigula
Ana mu yalakweyi ngawa mwana kulumbila kwakwanila, kwa jwakwete lunda
Ana nganinyyiona yawatite Ambuje wenu kaape ipotesi wanya Adi
Wa ku Irama; achalewulewu mpela misaati
Wanganagumbidweje wane wanti chisawu wanganyao mu ilambo (ine)
Ni wanya Asamuda wawaliji nkusokola maganga pachiwata (chakuwilanjikwa Wadi Qura kuwa majumba gao)
Kwisa soni Firiauna nsyene ichili (yakulimbanganyichisya uchimwene wakwe)
Awala wana kusumbaga mpika mu ilambo (pakusakasya)
Ni watupiye mwalakwemo kuwatanganya
Basi Ambuje wenu wapungulile wanganyao mitundu ja ilagasyo (yakupoteka nnope)
Chisimu Ambuje wenu awele Wang'unulila (masengo ga wandu, mwanti chachalipila mwaakupanganyichisya)
Sano mundu ndema jaakun'dinga Ambujegwe pakunchimbichisya ni kumpa chindimba, basi akasatiji: “Ambuje wangu anjimbichisye (ligongo une nijwakuwajilwa kupata yeleyi).”
Nambo ndema jaakun'dinga pakunnandiyichisya lisiki lyakwe, akasatiji: “Ambuje wangu anjalwisye.”
Ngwamba! Nambo kuti ngankwatendelaga yaukoto wanache wawina
Soni ngankuchisyanaga yaagaliisya masikini
Ni nkulyaga chipanje chamalekwa kalye kakutunduka
Ni nkuchinonyelaga soni chipanje kachinonyele kakupelenganya nnope
Ngawa (mwankutendelamo)! Ndema jalichisyajidwa litaka syajidwe-syajidwe
Ni kwika Ambuje wenu (Allah kukwiilanya magambo), Achimalaika ali ndandanda
Ni kwikanajo lyele lisikulyo Jahannama! Lyele lisikulyo mundu tachikumbuchila (yawapanganyisye), nambo ana kuchinkamuchisya chichi kwele kumbuchilako
Tachiti (pakuligamba): “Nkongwene! Bola ngalongosye (yambone yakungamuchisya) pa umi wangu (walelo uno).”
Mwanti palyele lisikuli, pangali jwampaka apeleche ilagasyo mwatachipelechela (Allah)
Soni pangali jwampaka atawe mwatachitawila (Jwalakwe)
E mmwe antima wakutulala
Wujilani kwa Ambuje wenu n'di wakusengwa ni kunonyeledwa
Jinjilani mwikuga lya achikapolo Wangu
Soni jinjilani ku Mbepo Jangu
Nguulumbila awu musi (wa Maaka)
Soni mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) tinchiwa wakundisyidwa (kuputa ngondo) mu wele musiwu
Ni ngullumbila soni nangolo ni uwelesi wajuweleche
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu m’matabu
Ana juganichisya yanti pangali wampaka ankombole (kumpa ilagasyo)
Jukuwecheta (mwakutwanga kuti): “Njonasile yipanje yejinji (kuti Usilamu usilale).”
Ana juganichisya kuti pangali waakun'bona
Ana nganitun'gumbila meso gawili (gajukulolela)
Ni lulimi kwisa soni ngomo siwili (syajukuwechetela)
Ni tun’jongolele matala gawili (lyambone ni lyakusakala, kuti jusagule lyajukusaka)
Ana pakwete pajujesile litala lyamwitumbi (lyalikam’bikasye ku Mbepo)
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya litala lyamwitumbi
(Litala lyamwitumbi nimasengo gambone nambo gakunonopa, mpela): gopola kapolo
Kapena kupeleka yakulya palisiku lyasala
(Kumpa) jwawina jwapaulongo
Kapena masikini jwaluwunduwundupe (ligongo lyakulaga nnope)
Soni nikuwa (nkutola yakulyajo) jumpepe mwa awala waakulupilile, ni kulimbikasyanaga ya kupilila soni ni kulimbikasyanaga ya kutendelana chanasa
Wanganyao niwandu wakun'dyo (wali wambone)
Nambo wandu waagakaaniile ma Aya Getu wanganyao niwandu wakunchiji (wali wakusakala)
Kwawanganyao kuchiwa kwana Moto Wakuunichila ni kutika (wangali pakopochela)
Ngulilumbila lyuwa ni lilanguka lyakwe
Ni mwesi ndema jaukulikuya (lyuwalyo)
Ni muusi ndema jaukulilosya palangulangu
Ni chilo ndema jachikuliunichila (kuti likaoneka)
Kwisa soni liwunde ni Juwalitawile (mwakulitalichisya)
Ni litaka ni Juwalitandiche (mwakulijaasasya)
Kwisa soni ntima ni Juwaukolosisye
Basi ni jwaumanyisye yakusakala yakwe ni yambone yakwe
Pamasile paapundile jwauswejesye (ntima wakwe)
Soni pamasile papelelwe jwautwinyichisye (ntima wakwe mu sambi)
Waakaaniile wanya Asamudu ligongo lyakusumba mpika kwao
Ndema jajwalipeleche jwakusakalilwa jwao (kuulaga ngamiya)
Basi Ntenga jwa Allah (Swaleh) wasalile kuti: “(Aji ni) ngamiya ja Allah, sano ngasin'jikanyaga kumwa mesi (palisiku lyakwe)
Nambo wankaaniile nikujiulaga; basi Ambuje wao wajonasile ligongo lya chilewi chao; niwalandenye pachonasikocho
Soni jwangajogopa yakuichisya yakwe
Nguchilumbila chilo ndema jachikuunichila (chilichose ni chipi chakwe)
Ni muusi ndema jakukulanguka
Ni Ajula (Allah) Jwagumbile chachilume ni chachikongwe
Chisimu itendo yenu iwele yakulekangana-lekangana
Sano mundu jwaakutola (petala lya Allah) ni kuwa niwoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
Ni kulupilila yambone nnope (yatakalipidwe ligongo lyakutola)
Basi chitun'jepepachisye litala lyakwalukangana (lyakutendela yambone)
Nambo mundu jwachatende ubayili ni kuliona kusichila
Ni kanila yambone nnope (yaakajiile kuipata akatole)
Basi chitun'jepepachisye litala lyausito (lyakutendela yakusakala)
Soni ngasichija kunkamuchisya chipanje chakwe ndema jagwila (ku Moto)
Chisimu Kukwetu nikwachili chongolo
Soni chisimu Uwwe ni twachinsyene Akhera ni Duniya
Basi nguntetela ya Moto waukolela (mwamachili)
Ngaaja kuwujinjila ikaweje jwakusakalilwa nnope
Ajula jwaakuwa nkukanila ni kusyulula
Ni takawambasyidwe nao mundu jwawoga kusyene (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Ajula jwaakutola chipanje chakwe pakuliswejesya
Soni pangali kwa jwalakwe jwalijose jwawantendele yaukoto yaikuwa ili nkuusyidwa
Ikaweje (jukutola) pakusachilila Ngope ja M’mbujeegwe (Allah) Jwapenani kusyene (kuti jukajione ku Akhera)
Ni juchija kusengwa
Nguulumbila nsana
Ni chilo ndema jachikutulala
Ngananneka Ambuje wenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) soni nganam'benga
Soni chisimu umi wambesi uwele wambone nnope kukwenu kupunda wandanda
Soni tachija kumpa Ambuje wenu (yambone) ni tinchisengwa
Ana nganansimana n'di wawina nikumpa liwuto lyambone
Soni ni wansimene n'di wangachimanya chongoko (jajili Qur'an ni malamusi ga Dini) nikun'jongola
Ni wansimene soni n'di wakulaga nikunsichilisya
Sano mwanache jwawina basi ngasimunchima
Nombe soni jwakuwenda basi ngasimunkalipila
Soni chindimba cha Ambuje wenu (Allah) basi chisimbani (pakutogolela ni kutenda yambone)
Ana nganitunsapangulila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chidali chenu (pakumpa utume)
Ni tuntuusile nsigo wenu (wausito wa kalungusye ka utenga, pakun’jepepachisya kalungusye kakwe)
Awula (nsigo wakwe) wawalumbisye n'gongo wenu
Ni tunnyakuliile kusaalidwa kwenu
Basi chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Sano pati mmalisyisye (masengo genu), basi limbichilani (kutenda ibada)
Soni kwa Ambuje wenu pe (Allah) basi sachililani (ukoto Wakwe)
Nguulumbila nkuju ni nzaituni
Ni litumbi lya Sinai
Kwisa soni awu nsinda (wa Maaka) wantunjelele
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu mu kagumbidwe kambone nnope
Kaneka nitukum'busyaaga kuwa jwapasi kwapunda wapasi wosope (pa uchekulu wakulepela nao kutenda yambone)
Ikaweje wandu waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone (ali wachilimbanganile), basi akwete kupata wanganyao malipilo gangamala
Ana panyuma (pa kuimanya yele) nichichi chikuntendekasya kanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Ana Allah nganawa Nkwiilanya chenene (magambo) kwapunda akwiilanya wosope
Soomani mu lina lya Ambuje wenu (Allah) waagumbile
Agumbile mundu kuumila mu chipande chamyasi jekamatane
Soomani! Soni Ambuje wenu ni Wantuka kusyene
Awala waajiganyisye (kulemba) ni chakulembela
An'jiganyisye mundu yawalekaga ngaimanya
Yakuona! Chisimu mundu akuwaga jwakusumba mpika (pa kulikwesya)
Ligongo lyakuliona kusichila
Chisimu kwa Ambuje wenu pe (Allah) ni kwakuujila
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakuwa nkunkaanya
Kapolo (jwa Allah) ndema jajukusaka kuswali
Ana nkuyiona uli najuwaga (Muhammadi ﷺ) juli pachongoko
Kapena jukulamula ya woga (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Nambi nkuyiona uli nawaga (Abujahalio) akukanila ni kusyulula
Ana ngaakumanyilila yanti Allah akwaona (yaakutenda)
Ngwamba! Chisimu naga ngaakuleka, chiitwawuta umbo syapewuwo (pakwaponya ku Moto)
Liwuwo lyakwe lyaunami soni lyakulemwa
Basi waawilanje wandu wakwe (kuti ankamuchisye)
Nowe chitwawilanje Azabaniya (asilikali wa ku Moto)
Ngwamba! Mmwe ngasimunkunda jwalakwejo, nambo nsujuduji (kuswali) ni n’diwandichisyeje (kwa Allah)
Chisimu Uwwe tujitulwisye jalakwe (Qur'aniji) m’Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Chilo Chakuchimbichikachi chiwele chambone nnope kupunda myesi jakwana sausande
Achimalaika akasatulukaga pamo ni Nsimu (Jibulilu) mu Chele (Chilochi) kwa lisosa lya M’mbuje gwao, kwisa kulondesya chindu chilichose (pakuchiwika mu mpango wakwe)
Ntunjelele-tunjelelepe! Chele Chilocho, mpaka kumasikusiku
Wandu achimakafili kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), nganawa alekangene (ni ukafili wao) kwikanila ndema ja chayichilile chilosyo chakuonechela palangulangu
(Jwali) Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwakuumila kwa Allah jwaakusooma (Qur’an jajili mu) ikalakala yakuswejesyedwa
Mwalakwemo mwana malamusi gagoloka
Chisimu Allah akupeleka chanasa kwa Ntume (Muhammadi ﷺ), nombe nao soni Achimalaika (akum’bombelaga chanasa Ntumejo ﷺ). E jenumanja wankulupilile! Mum’bombelani chanasa jwalakwe ni kum’bombela soni ntendele
Ni nganalamulidwa ikaweje yanti an'galagatileje Allah mwakunswejechesya dini Jakwe pakupendechela ku Uujika Wakwe (nikutalikangana nayo isanamu), nikuti ajimicheje Swala mwakolosya ni kutolaga Zaka, soni jalakwejo ni dini jagoloka
Chisimu wandu waakanile (dini ja Usilamu); kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), chakawe m’moto wa Jahannama, chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo. Wanganyao ni iwumbe yakusakala nnope
Chisimu wandu waakulupilile nikutendaga yambone, wanganyao ni iwumbe yambone nnope
Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje wao chigakawe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
Pandema jalichitenganyika litaka nichisikinya chakwe chamachili
Ni kwisa koposya litaka misigo jakwe jausito (ichindu yayaliji nkati mwakwe, mpela malilo ni mitapo jambiya)
Ni kwisa kuwecheta mundu (mwawoga soni mwakusimonga kuti): “Litite uli (litaka, ana Kiyama jiyiche?)”
Lyele lisikulyo (litaka) lichiwecheta abali syakwe syosope (sya indu yayatendekwele pachanya pakwe yambone kapena yakusakala)
Ligongo lyanti Ambuje wenu tachililamula lyalakwelyo (kuti liwechete)
Lyele lisikulyo wandu tachipwilingana ali m'mikutula jakulekangana-lekangana kuti akaalosye masengo gao
Basi jwatapanganye chambone chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Nombe soni jwatapanganye chakusakala chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Ngusilumbila hachi syasikuwutuka sili nkupumasika
Ni syasikoposya moto mu ikotwa mwakwe (pakuwutuka m’maganga)
Ni syasikwagungumuchila amagongo kumasikusiku
Nikututumya palakwepo luwundu lwejinji
Nikulijinjilila palakwepo likuga (lya amagongo)
Chisimu mundu kwa Ambujegwe (Allah) juwele jwakanila (ukoto waakumpa)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe jukuwichila umboni pa yalakweyo (kupitila mu itendo yakwe)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe pakuchinonyela chipanje juwele jwakupelenganya nnope
Ana ngajukumanyilila pandema jaichikoposyedwa yaili m’malembe
Nikwisa kwilochesya papaswela yaili m’mitima
Chisimu lyele lisikulyo M’mbuje gwao (Allah) tachamanya abali syosope (syakwamba yawapanganyaga wanganyao)
Chagunda ntima (Kiyama)
Ana chagunda ntima nichichi
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya chagunda ntima
Lyele ni lisiku (lya Kiyama) lyachachiwa wandu (sakalaalii!) mpela mapuluputwa gakusapalala
Nombe matumbi gachiwa (nkuwululuka) mpela litonji lyetyosye mbele
Sano mundu jwachiukasitope n'diingo wakwe (wa yambone, nikwepepala yakusakala)
Basi jwalakwejo takawe mu ndamo jakusengwasya
Nambo mundu jwachiukajepepale n'dingo wakwe (wa yambone, ni kusitopa yakusakala)
Basi liuto lyakwe ni ku Hawiya
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya jele (Hawiya)
Wele ni Moto Wakoocha nnope
Kumpele chipaka kusonganganya (ya duniya mwampikisano kuleka ganisya ya Akhera)
Mpaka nkwikanila kwaula ku malembe (n'di m'bwile)
Ngwamba! Chinchiika kumanyilila
Soni ngwamba! Chinchiika kumanyilila
Ngwamba! Ingawe mwamanyililaga umanyilisi usyesyene (nga nganin'jijilikaga ni ya duniya)
Chisimu chene chinkauone Moto Waukali
Soni chinkauone kusyene ni liso lyakusimichisya
Soni lyele lisikulyo tinkawusyidwe kusyene ya chindimba (chawampele pa duniya)
Ngujilumbila ndawi
Chisimu chene mundu ali nchasiko (ni kupelelwa)
Ikaweje awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, ni kulimbisyanaga ya (kuya ichindu) yakuona, ni kulimbisyanaga soni yakupilila
Ipotesi ni yakwe jwalijose jwakwasogoda ni kwachembulusya wandu mwakwamumunya
Ajula jwaachisonganganyisye chipanje nikuchiwalanjilaga (ndema ni katema)
Akuganichisya kuti chipanje chakwecho chichintendekasye kuwa jwandamo
Ngwamba! Chisimu chene takaponyedwe ku Hutwama
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Hutwama
Wele ni Moto wa Allah wachikolelele (wakuteketulanya chilichose chakuponyedwamo)
Awula wachiuwa nkukwelela ku mitima
Chisimu walakweo uchaunichila ni kwaakutika wanganyao (kwakusowa pakopochela)
(Chachiwa) m’makongwa getandaliche chanchilewu (mwanti ngasakombola kupuluputa)
Ana nganinyyiona yawatite Ambuje wenu (Allah) pakwajonanga achinsyene ndembo (wawayikaga kugumula Likaaba)
Ana nganagatenda malindi gao kuwa gakusokonechela
Ni watumichisye wanganyao ijuni mikutula-mikutula
Yaliji nkwaasoma ni maganga gelongo lyejoche (ni moto wa ku Jahannama)
Niwatesile kuwa mpela masapi gagalilidwe (ni inyama ni kulukulidwa)
(Wajonasile achinsyene ndembo) kuti ajendelechele Makuraishi
Panyendele jao jamaulendo ga chuku (kuja ku Yemeni) ni chawu (kuja ku Shami kumalonda mwantunjelele)
Basi an'galagatileje M'mbuje jwa aji Nyumba (ja Likaaba)
Ajula jwawapele yakulya ligongo lyasala, ni kwawambasya ku woga
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakukanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Basi jwele ni ajula jwaakuntutanga mwanache jwawina
Soni jwangachisya yagaliisya masikini
Basi ipotesi niyao wandu wakuswaliji
Awala wanya waakuwa ali nkusikwanjila swala syao
Awala wanya waakuwa ali nkutenda ndola
Ni akuwa soni ali nkukanya yaakamuchisya (pannango, mpela liwago, chipula, lituli ni yine)
Chisimu Uwwe tumpele (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) Kauthara (lusulo lwa ku Mbepo)
Basi mwaswalilani Ambuje wenu (Allah) nikusikita (inyama yakur’bani yakupelechela mbepesi Kukwakwe ngawaga kwa akumasoka)
Chisimu jwaakum'benga mmwejo ni jwali jwakatika (upile wakwe ni kusalidwa kwakwe)
Jilani: “E jenumanja achimakafili!”
“Ngangalagatila chinkuchigalagatila (kunneka Allah).”
“Nombe wanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Nombe une soni nganimba nachigalagatile cham'bele n'di nkuchigalagatila wanganyammwe.”
“Nombe wanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Jenumanja nkwete dini jenu (jagalagatila isanamu) une none ngwete dini jangu (jakun’galagatila Allah).”
Ndema jachiyiche chikulupusyo cha Allah ni kuwugula (Maaka kuwa m’makono mwa Asilamu)
Ni kwaona mmwejo wandu ali nkwinjila mu dini ja Allah mikutula-mikutula
Basi (jele ndemajo) luswejesyani lumbili lwa Ambuje wenu, ni kwawenda chikululuko. Chisimu Walakweo awele Wakupochela nnope toba
Gajonasiche makono ganagawili ga Abu Lahabi, nombe nao ajonasiche
Ngaija kwakamuchisya ipanje yao atamuno yawapanganyisye (mpela wanache wawaweleche)
Takajinjile ku Moto waukwete malamba (gakulapuka)
Niwankwao wakwe wawaliji nkutwichila sasu (syamiwa nikuntejelaga Muhammadi ﷺ mwakupita)
Nnukosi mwao (wele wakongweo) chimukawe mwana litondolo lyamiwamiwa (lyakwalagachisya nalyo)
Jilani: “Jwalakwe ni Allah Jumpepe.”
“Allah pe ni jwakun'jegama.”
“Nganaweleka soni nganawelechedwa.”
“Soni nganakola jwakulanda najo ata jumo.”
Jilani: “Ngulijuya mwa M’mbuje jwa kumasikusiku.”
“Ku yakusakala yawaigumbile.”
“Ni ku yakusakala yachilo ndema jachikwinjila chipi.”
“Ni ku yakusakala ya (asawi) waakupepela mu iwundo (pakuloga).”
“Ni ku yakusakala ya jwalitima ndema jajukutenda litima.”
Jilani: “Ngulijuya mwa M'mbuje jwa wandu.”
“Nchimwene jwa wandu.”
“Nnungu jwa wandu.”
“Ku yakusakala ya nkusongona (pakuunyenjelela ntima yakusakala), jwakuujiilila ni kuliisisa (naga nsyene ntimao juli junkolasile Allah).”
“Ajula jwaakusongonaga m’mitima mwa wandu.”
“Jwakuumila m’majini ni mu wandu.”
